programme.desc: Crabby, the centres grumpiest resident, greets a new arrival that melts his icy heart, and Princess - queen of the resident penguins - faces the biggest loss of her young life

programme.title: Fish or Die
programme.desc: The intrepid anglers are in Borneo searching for the mahseer - a fish close to extinction. To find it, they risk entering the territory of the headhunting Dayak people

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: WWE star Chris Jericho asks Brett Raymer and Wayde King to build him a large aquarium, complete with a replica championship belt, and a list of Jericho

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: The animal protection officers have cause to investigate a breeder

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: Houston SPCAs Chief Investigator Charles Jantzen joins his team on an emergency mission in Galveston to try to save hundreds of trapped pets from Hurricane Ike

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Steve Irwin loved sea turtles. Terri and Robert continue his legacy as they transport three rescued sea turtles to Lady Elliot Island on the Great Barrier Reef - for the first time, by air. This complex mission is vital in order to help conserve these beautiful but endangered animals. While Robert and Terri take to the skies, Bindi and the team are nervously waiting for the birth of Australia Zoos first Sumatran tiger cub in three years. Richie from the rescue unit helps with a baby wallabys struggle for survival

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: Tia attempts to rescue a stray, but her leg injury holds her back, and new parolee Mike struggles to balance working and parenthood

programme.title: Alaska: Homestead Rescue
programme.sub-title: Home Sweet Homestead: Rugged Road Home
programme.desc: Marty embarks on a dangerous self-shot mission to carve a road up 300-ft cliffs. Meanwhile, Misty enlists her family to build a predator-proof coop for the chickens

programme.title: Alaska: Homestead Rescue
programme.sub-title: Home Sweet Homestead: Future of the Forty
programme.desc: Spring arrives and the family self-shoots preparation for the epic expansion of their homestead. Misty plots a huge greenhouse to feed three generations

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: The Game Wardens have a busy weekend in Texas as they deal with thousands of festival-goers on the San Marcos River and a patrol on Lake Texoma leads to multiple arrests

programme.title: Dr Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.sub-title: The Dog Who Won Jeffs Heart
programme.desc: A client brings in an unusual pet who is fast outgrowing his enclosure. Dr Jeff treats a cat with several serious - and mysterious - injuries

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete Nelson designs a beehive-style structure for couple Donald and Alison Farmer. The small space includes shelving, soft seating and hexagonal, honeycomb-inspired features

programme.title: River of No Return
programme.desc: Following residents in the Frank Church Wilderness in Idaho. As the winter ice thaws, people living on the bank are forced to navigate the spring rapids

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: The Kilchers celebrate Thanksgiving with their friends, who have helped them to prepare for the harsh winter ahead

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.sub-title: Bam Bams Big Build and Bears
programme.desc: Bird and Gabe are forced to take action when a hungry predator approaches. Meanwhile, Bam Bam must play nice with his siblings to break ground on his homestead

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: Tia attempts to rescue a stray, but her leg injury holds her back, and new parolee Mike struggles to balance working and parenthood

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Steve Irwin loved sea turtles. Terri and Robert continue his legacy as they transport three rescued sea turtles to Lady Elliot Island on the Great Barrier Reef - for the first time, by air. Richie from the rescue unit helps with a baby wallabys struggle for survival

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: The animal protection officers have cause to investigate a breeder

programme.title: Winter Walks
programme.desc: Yorkshire peer Baroness Sayeeda Warsi takes time out from her political life to seek peace and calm in the Dales. On her ramble through Wharfedale, the former government minister meets villagers in Kettlewell, a farmer preparing for lambing and a long-distance fell runner

programme.title: Christmas University Challenge
programme.sub-title: Exeter College, Oxford v Queen Mary University, London
programme.desc: Exeter College, Oxford and Queen Mary University, London are represented by distinguished alumni in the fourth heat of the 2022 Christmas University Challenge. Newsreader Reeta Chakrabarti and environmental writer Lucy Siegle are hoping to lead their respective teams to a place in the semi-finals. Jeremy Paxman asks the questions

programme.title: Dame Judi Dench: My Passion for Trees
programme.desc: The actress meets experts and historians to discover how embedded trees are in Britains history and how important they are to its future. Filmed over the course of a year, this programme offers a study of the changing seasons and their effect on Surrey, the most wooded county in Britain, which Judi has called home for the last 30 years

programme.title: Live Snooker: UK Championship
programme.desc: Hazel Irvine presents further coverage of the evening session on day six at York Barbican, featuring two second-round matches, played over the best of 11 frames. Then reigning world champion Kyren Wilson dominated his contest at this stage last year, prevailing 6-2 against Chris Wakelin. The encounter between Jak Jones and Michael Holt was considerably closer, with Holt eventually prevailing 6-5. With commentary and analysis from Steve Davis, John Parrott, Ken Doherty, Dennis Taylor and Stephen Hendry, and reports from Shabnam Younus-Jewell

programme.title: Quartet
programme.desc: Three former opera singers prepare for their annual concert to mark Verdis birthday and raise funds for their retirement home. However, this year, a famous diva has joined the group, and her history with the others threatens the performance. Comedy drama, directed by Dustin Hoffman and starring Maggie Smith, Billy Connolly, Tom Courtenay, Pauline Collins and Michael Gambon

programme.title: Wogan
programme.sub-title: Pauline Collins, Simon Callow, Esther Rantzen and Desmond Wilcox
programme.desc: Terry Wogan speaks to actress Pauline Collins, actor Simon Callow, journalist Esther Rantzen and TV producer Desmond Wilcox. First broadcast 8 January 1988

programme.title: Capability Browns Unfinished Garden
programme.desc: Bunny Guinness tries to carry out the 18th-century English landscape designers plans for his own garden in Fenstanton, Cambridgeshire. Brown travelled the length and breadth of the country, improving more than 200 of the greatest estates in the land, for some of the most influential people of the day, but the design for his own garden never got off the drawing board

programme.title: Britains Most Fragile Treasure
programme.desc: Janina Ramirez explores the complex history of York Minsters Great East Window, the largest medieval stained-glass window in England. Composed of 311 panels, it was originally designed to tell the complete biblical history of the world from creation to the Last Judgement, and has been compared to Michelangelos work at the Sistine Chapel. The historian closely examines the handiwork of its creator John Thornton, revealing intricate details that would not normally be visible, and follows a project to restore the window to its original glory

programme.title: Winter Walks
programme.desc: Yorkshire peer Baroness Sayeeda Warsi takes time out from her political life to seek peace and calm in the Dales. On her ramble through Wharfedale, the former government minister meets villagers in Kettlewell, a farmer preparing for lambing and a long-distance fell runner

programme.title: Dame Judi Dench: My Passion for Trees
programme.desc: The actress meets experts and historians to discover how embedded trees are in Britains history and how important they are to its future. Filmed over the course of a year, this programme offers a study of the changing seasons and their effect on Surrey, the most wooded county in Britain, which Judi has called home for the last 30 years

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Sara Cox and Greg Rutherford host the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Rip Off Britain
programme.desc: Julia Somerville, Gloria Hunniford and Louise Minchin reveal how criminals are using artificial intelligence to create deepfake online videos of celebrities and public figures to try to get their hands on peoples cash. Plus, the Lancashire man whose savings account was raided by fraudsters who obtained his security passcode

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Dion Dublin is at a three-bedroom house in the West Midlands that has some worrying cracks and Martel Maxwell visits a mid-terrace house in Durham. Martin Roberts investigates a heating mystery in a one bedroom flat in Dartford, Kent

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Roo Irvine hosts the latest contest at the Antiques, Vintage and Collectors Fair in Detling, Kent. With expert help on hand from Irita Marriott and Nick Hall, the reds and the blues go head to head to see who can buy the most profitable items to sell at auction. Roo also finds out how retro computers are now becoming collectable

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: The Marvellous Miniature Workshop
programme.desc: Sara Cox meets Julia, a jazz singer with powerful memories of Readings Central Club - a place of music, domino tournaments and Caribbean pride, where her father was a local legend. With the building now abandoned, Ethan Goodbody faces the challenge of reviving its spirit in miniature. His intention is to bring back the stage, the iconic mural and the heartbeat of a vanished community

programme.title: Make It at Market
programme.desc: Birmingham cleaner Rachel has only been creating jewellery from clay for a couple of years to help with her anxiety. She soon fell in love with the craft and wishes to leave her job to devote herself to it. However, mentor Rachel Jeffery is concerned that her lack of confidence is holding her back by under-pricing and under-selling herself. Wiltshire coppersmith and sculptor Roy has recently given up his day job to commit to his craft. Hes got the skills, but Dom Chinea and mentor Ian Gill have spotted ways he can refine and speed up his work to help boost his profits

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A couple from Kent want to head west to Cornwall to house-hunt for a property where they can create a wellness retreat, and Jules Hudson is just the man to help them find it. Taking a break from the search, Jules hopes to catch a glimpse of a recently released family of beavers

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.desc: Nigel Havers presents as dealers bid for an etagere - a tiered table for display, a German pendant light with textured glass lampshades, some napkin clips found in a charity shop in Canada, a Victorian spinning wheel and an exercise bike

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.sub-title: If You Go Down to the Woods Today
programme.desc: Raj Bisram and Briony Harford continue exploring the shops of Kent in search of hidden gems. Raj is hoping for the sweet smell of success with one fragrant find and gets all nostalgic over a classic toy brand that takes him back. Bee also has transportation in mind and splashes out on a Victorian vehicle with an equine charm - though it might just blow her budget. Their journey takes a wild turn with a woodland detour, where they meet some of the countys furriest residents, including one very brave bear with a story to tell

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Stephen Mangan joins Alexander Armstrong to co-host the quiz, in which contestants try to score the fewest points possible by giving the most obscure answers

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Alex Jones and JB Gill host the live magazine show featuring a mixture of celebrity chat and stories of interest

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Lauren and Zoes friendship deepens as they discuss the latters long-lost son, but later, as they head back to Laurens place, someone is watching them from the shadows. George makes an effort to forgive, and Billy is given a mission by Lexi

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World
programme.desc: The penultimate leg of the race is the longest so far, with the teams travelling from the islands of Bocas del Toro on northern Panamas Caribbean coast, to Medellín, Colombias second largest city. Standing in their way is the notorious and dangerous Darien Gap - their only option is to bypass it by sea, enduring a lengthy, arduous and costly boat journey, putting their dwindling budgets under pressure. On reaching the final country of the race, teams are confronted with another challenge to overcome - a heightened security risk on the route to Medellín

programme.title: Celebrity MasterChef
programme.desc: The stage is set for the last quarter-final, meaning the stars need to use every trick in their recipe book to stand any chance of progressing. For the first time the celebrities working in pairs, with judges Grace Dent and John Torode arming each duo with a recipe. They must deliver two identical portions of that dish, but only one member of each duo has access to their recipe. Then, once again flying solo, the contestants deliver their best two-course menu to the judges and former series alumni Craig Doyle, Amy Walsh and Kadeena Cox

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: The View
programme.desc: Mark Carruthers presents a review of the weeks political news, including reports on the latest events at Stormont and Westminster. Plus, comment and analysis with studio guests

programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents topical debate from the Kent port of Dover. On her panel are Migration Minister Mike Tapp MP, Shadow Justice Minister Kieran Mullan MP, Deputy Leader of the Liberal Democrats Daisy Cooper MP, Leader of the Green Party Zack Polanski and Reform UKs Head of Policy Zia Yusuf

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: A panel of BBC journalists hosts a weekly round-up from Westminster, delivering the usual mix of serious analysis and light-hearted gossip about the biggest stories in politics

programme.title: Michael McIntyres The Wheel
programme.desc: The comedian hosts the game show in which contestants answer questions with the aid of celebrity experts - aware that one wrong answer means someone else gets a chance. Advising the contestants are Rachel Riley, Ellie Simmonds, Richard Madeley, David Walliams, Adam Hills, Fatiha El-Ghorri, Vogue Williams and Spencer Matthews

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: The Chase star Mark Labbett joins Rattus to look at some of historys most brilliant brainboxes, from taking man to the moon to figuring out how to get rid of a poo in a submarine

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.sub-title: Kings and Queens-A Right Royal Special
programme.desc: Featuring a new sketch with Elizabeth I searching for a successor in her show Englands Got Monarchs

programme.title: The Catch Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.sub-title: Top Gear Patagonia Special - Part One
programme.desc: The first half of a two-part special, the filming of which caused controversy in Argentina because of a registration plate that drew links to the Falklands War. Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May take three used V8-engined sports cars on a gruelling road trip covering 1,600 miles through Patagonia. Their chosen vehicles are the Porsche 928, Lotus Esprit and Ford Mustang, which are subjected to rigours beyond the scope of their original designs - from tackling swamps and crossing deserts to navigating forests, beaches and ski slopes. Their destination is Ushuaia, the worlds southernmost city, where they hope to stage a game of car football against Argentina

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.sub-title: Top Gear Patagonia Special - Part Two
programme.desc: The conclusion of the two-part special in which Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May take three used, V8-engined sports cars on a gruelling road trip covering 1,600 miles through Patagonia to the worlds southernmost city. Having encountered stunning landscapes, mechanical mishaps and dreadful roads on their journey through Argentina, the trios adventure is brought to a dramatic climax by a terrifying turn of events

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: After the success of his comeback fight, Tommys road to redemption hits a major setback - his hand is injured again and needs eight weeks total rest before doctors will know if he can fight again. The last time he couldnt train, his life spiralled out of control, so now Tommy throws himself into a frenzy of activity - a TV appearance on The Wheel, family days out with Bambi and a final push to finish the home he hopes Molly and Bambi will soon return to

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommys recovery is back on track after he and John put his hand to the test. The pair are training again, and the search for Tommys next opponent begins. Eager to make the most of family time, Tommy splashes out on a £90,000 motor home for family trips with Molly and Bambi and takes his mother out for lunch and a long-overdue catch-up. Tommy reveals that John has had a recent health scare, so to cheer him up, father and son take their very different caravans to a local steam fair

programme.title: Fake Friend: The Ticket Scammer
programme.desc: The case of a Somerset high-flyer who turned his charm and connections into tools of deception, conning his friends and hundreds of others, while living a life of glamour himself. Through the voices of his victims and event industry insiders, this documentary uncovers the high personal and financial cost of chasing exclusivity, and how easily even the most cautious can be deceived

programme.title: Survivor Australia
programme.desc: KJ reflects on her decision to vote out her sister, and Amy is concerned about her position within her swapped tribe.

programme.title: Survivor Australia
programme.desc: Nina feels comfortable in her majority alliance with the Blood guys, and Jesse plots his next move against a challenge threat

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommys recovery is back on track after he and John put his hand to the test. The pair are training again, and the search for Tommys next opponent begins. Eager to make the most of family time, Tommy splashes out on a £90,000 motor home for family trips with Molly and Bambi and takes his mother out for lunch and a long-overdue catch-up. Tommy reveals that John has had a recent health scare, so to cheer him up, father and son take their very different caravans to a local steam fair

programme.title: My Mates a Bad Date
programme.desc: Larisa is fed up of hearing about her best mate Damis latest in a long line of dating fails. He walks out mid-date, interrogates and pulls girls up on their outfits, music choices and lifestyle, and thinks theyre lucky to have him! Its time for an intervention. Larisa enlists the help of Gen Zs most trusted sex and relationships expert Oloni to put the 24-year-old Londoner on the spot and help him own up to his disastrous dating habits

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommys recovery is back on track after he and John put his hand to the test. The pair are training again, and the search for Tommys next opponent begins. Eager to make the most of family time, Tommy splashes out on a £90,000 motor home for family trips with Molly and Bambi and takes his mother out for lunch and a long-overdue catch-up. Tommy reveals that John has had a recent health scare, so to cheer him up, father and son take their very different caravans to a local steam fair

programme.title: Ruby Gillman, Teenage Kraken
programme.desc: Shy teenager Ruby Gillman is a kraken who lives on dry land in Oceanside with parents Arthur and Agatha and her younger brother Sam. A failed prom proposal culminates in Ruby plunging into the sea, and finally she discovers she is destined to inherit the throne from her kraken grandmother. Animated coming-of-age fantasy, featuring the voices of Lana Condor and Jane Fonda

programme.title: Ghosts US
programme.sub-title: A Very Arondekar Christmas - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. A leaky water-heater mishap threatens to ruin festive holiday plans as Sam and Jay prepare to host Jays hard-to-please dad, difficult-to-impress mum and sister Bela. American version of the British comedy series, starring Utkarsh Ambudkar, Rose McIver and Brandon Scott Jones

programme.title: Ghosts US
programme.sub-title: A Very Arondekar Christmas - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of two. A failed exorcism puts Jay in a vicarious position as Sam works to restore him. Meanwhile, Pete in possession of Jays body, is determined to see his daughter one last time. American version of the British comedy series, starring Utkarsh Ambudkar, Rose McIver and Brandon Scott Jones

programme.title: Here We Go
programme.desc: An awkward encounter with local artist Frank, commissioned by Rachel to paint a Jessop family portrait, leads to Sue buying a swimming pool to help her recover from her hip replacement. As Paul struggles with a month-long family detox set by Amy and Rachel attempts to fix the painting, in which she is convinced he deliberately made her look older, the pool is accidentally ruined on its maiden voyage. To make matters worse, Frank suddenly demands his painting back to include in a small exhibition. Hiding out at Cherrys new Salsa class, Rachel and Paul decide to pluck up the courage to deal with Frank, the pool and the detox in one evening

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Malcolm surprises Gemma and Sadie with a weekend away. Returning home from living in Spain, Malcolms estranged father Jackie invites himself along. Worn down by his fathers constant jibes and Gemmas disappointment at the holiday, Malcolm calls Derek for help. Between managing Dereks secret addiction and Jackie trying to recruit investors to his business, Malcolm enters the talent contest. Comedy, starring Aimee Lou Wood, David Morrissey, Jill Halfpenny and Sarah Hadland

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World
programme.desc: The penultimate leg of the race is the longest so far, with the teams travelling from the islands of Bocas del Toro on northern Panamas Caribbean coast, to Medellín, Colombias second largest city. Standing in their way is the notorious and dangerous Darien Gap - their only option is to bypass it by sea, enduring a lengthy, arduous and costly boat journey, putting their dwindling budgets under pressure. On reaching the final country of the race, teams are confronted with another challenge to overcome - a heightened security risk on the route to Medellín

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: A British family spends Christmas in Thailand, only to get caught up in the 2004 tsunami. While his mother lies injured in hospital, the eldest son ventures into the ensuing chaos to search for his father and younger brothers, whom he was separated from during the crisis. Drama, with Naomi Watts, Ewan McGregor and Tom Holland

programme.title: Survivor Australia
programme.desc: With the obvious vote to finish what they started, Water are ready to get rid of Ben once and for all. However, the lines in the sand are always shifting as Ben debates his alliance to his OG Blood v the new Kid on the block

programme.title: Survivor Australia
programme.desc: A group of 24 Australians are stranded on a remote island with challenges to complete with the winner taking home $500,000. The votes might seem obvious in the game of Blood v Water, but only for whose responsible for staying in the game

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommys recovery is back on track after he and John put his hand to the test. The pair are training again, and the search for Tommys next opponent begins. Eager to make the most of family time, Tommy splashes out on a £90,000 motor home for family trips with Molly and Bambi and takes his mother out for lunch and a long-overdue catch-up. Tommy reveals that John has had a recent health scare, so to cheer him up, father and son take their very different caravans to a local steam fair

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chaotic cartoon capers following the further adventures of the popular halfwit immortalised in the live-action TV series and Hollywood films. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Tom and Jerry in New York
programme.sub-title: Put A Ring On It/Come Fly with Me/Bubble Gum Crisis/Mousequerade
programme.desc: Animated adventures with the cat and mouse duo, who persistently torment and humiliate each other

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and the Mystery Inc. gang meet up with basketball legend and bowling aficionado Chris Paul at a golf tournament fundraiser held in Florida

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes Mr Paliwal’s personal trainer for the day - by making him revamp Mrs Wicket’s garden! / Mr Bean sneaks into an indoor trampoline park, but a show-off boy keeps picking on him and Teddy.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.sub-title: Buddies Thicker Than Water/Much Ado About Mousing/Calypso Cat

programme.desc: Giovanna and Baby Bear welcome little ones Alfie, Charlie, Ollie, River, Araiya and their grown-ups to The Baby Club. Parents, carers and their babies at home are invited to join in with all the fun activities too! Inside Giovannas bag are numbered building blocks, and all the parents and little ones have different objects and toys that are themed around numbers. These are explored through discovery, play, song and story. Grown-ups at home are encouraged to take part by hiding safe, baby-appropriate number-themed objects and toys inside a fabric bag or pillowcase for them to reveal and explore with their baby! The traditional childrens nursery rhyme One, Two, Buckle My Shoe features, as does a story involving Baby Bear, and viewers at home show how theyve been exploring numbers too. The Action Song gets everyone moving about, before some calm time with sensory bubbles and the Goodbye Song.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Sisters Ros and Elizabeth want to retire together to their dream home near Bergerac in France. The Dordogne is famous for its wine, warm summers, castles and green forests. Plus, on the banks of the river, Bergeracs old town offers charming cafes and shops for locals and tourists alike. Lee Juggurnauth shows Ros and Elizabeth five options for their maximum budget of £350,000, from a grand country home and picture-perfection to a place ticking boxes by the minute

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc: People affected by cancer share their personal and moving stories. Morgan was a happy little boy from Swansea who loved football, cars and his family. When he was two years old, he was diagnosed with a rare form of cancer linked to a genetic condition that affects just one in one million people. Further testing revealed that his dad and little sister also carry the same mutation. His close relatives share their story

programme.title: Kirsties Handmade Christmas

Plus, a visit to one of Kirsties favourite antique shops to gather inspiration for a Christmas party table and ideas for handcrafted decorations

programme.title: The Sycamore Gap Mystery
programme.desc: The conclusion of a two-part documentary recounting the September 2023 attack on Northumberlands iconic Sycamore Gap tree, which had famously stood in a remote nook of Hadrians Wall. After its deliberately felling, a complex police investigation ensued in an effort to get justice for the local community and the trees countless number of outraged fans across the world. With exclusive access to Northumbria Police, this documentary tells the extraordinary story of this headline-grabbing crime

programme.title: Cancer Detectives: Finding the Cures
programme.desc: The work of Manchester-based professor Caroline Dive, who is developing innovative blood tests to detect cancer, well before its visible on a scan. She is looking for tiny fragments of cancer DNA in the blood, which is comparable to searching for a needle in a haystack. Her innovative tests will also give clues on how to treat cancer, and in some cases cure. Taking part in her clinical trials are mechanic Lee, a medical mystery as doctors cant find where his cancer started, and Damian, who hopes to discover if his recent skin cancer will come back so he can move on with family life

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys India
programme.desc: Joanna Lumley travels back to the country of her birth, travelling the length and breadth of India to explore its diverse landscapes and cultural traditions. In this episode, her epic journey begins in Tamil Nadu, where she witnesses religious ceremonies in glorious temples, before visiting Gangtok in Sikkim, the place where her mother lived as a child

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys India
programme.desc: Joanna meets the Maharaja of Dungarpur who shows her around his lakeside palace, and a Dalit community in Gujarat, considered to be Indias lowest caste. Braving the roads of Mumbai, Joanna takes a ride in the citys only all-female taxi company and visits the Times of India, where her uncle was editor of the paper in the 1930s and 40s. She then overcomes her fear of heights to explore the World One Tower, soon to be Mumbais tallest luxury residential building

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys India
programme.desc: Joannas adventures across India conclude as she explores Rajasthan, Delhi and the mountainous North West, before ending in Kashmir, the place of her birth. Her first stop takes her to the Ranthambhore National Park, where she learns about the Wildlife Protection Society of Indias tiger conservation programmes. Joannas next stop takes her to the city of Delhi, where she begins her exploration of the capital at Humayuns Tomb, before ending her 5000 mile journey in Srinagar in Kashmi, the place where she was born

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Japan
programme.desc: Joanna begins a 2,000-mile journey across Japan in Hokkaido, where she meets one of the most important animals in Japanese culture, the red-crowned crane. She arrives in Sapporo during the middle of the annual Snow Festival and meets members of the local indigenous community, before travelling into the Fukushima exclusion zone and taking a bullet train from Nagano to Tokyo

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys India
programme.desc: Joanna Lumley travels back to the country of her birth, travelling the length and breadth of India to explore its diverse landscapes and cultural traditions. In this episode, her epic journey begins in Tamil Nadu, where she witnesses religious ceremonies in glorious temples, before visiting Gangtok in Sikkim, the place where her mother lived as a child

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys India
programme.desc: Joanna meets the Maharaja of Dungarpur who shows her around his lakeside palace, and a Dalit community in Gujarat, considered to be Indias lowest caste. Braving the roads of Mumbai, Joanna takes a ride in the citys only all-female taxi company and visits the Times of India, where her uncle was editor of the paper in the 1930s and 40s. She then overcomes her fear of heights to explore the World One Tower, soon to be Mumbais tallest luxury residential building

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys India
programme.desc: Joannas adventures across India conclude as she explores Rajasthan, Delhi and the mountainous North West, before ending in Kashmir, the place of her birth. Her first stop takes her to the Ranthambhore National Park, where she learns about the Wildlife Protection Society of Indias tiger conservation programmes. Joannas next stop takes her to the city of Delhi, where she begins her exploration of the capital at Humayuns Tomb, before ending her 5000 mile journey in Srinagar in Kashmi, the place where she was born

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Japan
programme.desc: Joanna begins a 2,000-mile journey across Japan in Hokkaido, where she meets one of the most important animals in Japanese culture, the red-crowned crane. She arrives in Sapporo during the middle of the annual Snow Festival and meets members of the local indigenous community, before travelling into the Fukushima exclusion zone and taking a bullet train from Nagano to Tokyo

programme.title: Heartbeat

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.sub-title: The Village That Rose from the Dead
programme.desc: Christmas special of the detective drama from 2016. The village of Little Auburn has stood abandoned since the Second World War, but now plans are afoot to restore it to its former glory via three competing projects. It is left to local landowner Roderick Craven to determine which scheme will win out, but on the eve of his big decision, one of the project leaders is murdered. DCI Barnaby and his new partner DS Jamie Winter are soon on the case, and when death stalks the streets of Little Auburn again, Barnaby and Winter are dragged into a web of conspiracy involving fraud, deadly snakes, and Rodericks estranged brother, Milo (guest star Hugh Dennis). Neil Dudgeon stars, with Nick Hendrix making his debut as Barnabys latest assistant

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Dr Liz Merrick is mortified when one of her patients dies of an insulin overdose, but even more so when Sgt Merton is forced to investigate her responsibility. Meanwhile, Vernon Scripps embarks on a mission to make Aidensfield sparkle with his own brand of cleaning products. Drama, starring Aislin McGuckin and Duncan Bell

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Steve comes to the aid of an amnesiac struggling to piece together his identity, Jenny tells Dennis she is tired of playing second fiddle to his career, and Bernie and David step in when it appears Vernons money-making schemes are getting the better of him. Rural drama, starring James Carlton, Ian East, Peter Benson, David Lonsdale and Geoffrey Hughes

programme.title: Rosemary and Thyme
programme.desc: An archaeologist posing as Rosemary dies mysteriously during a dig for Anglo-Saxon artefacts in the grounds of Lord Engletons stately home, presenting the duo with a fresh mystery to solve. The gardens are unaccountably blighted by yellowing, forcing the estate to close its gates to the public, and a second death suggests somebody will go to any lengths for a piece of British history. Guest starring Julian Wadham

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The detectives former colleague, Sergeant Stuart Macken, is left badly burned when his house is petrol-bombed, while his teenage daughter fights for her life in intensive care. As Vera tries to discover why anyone would attempt to kill Stuart, her investigation leads to unpleasant revelations about his personal life, and she has to face long-buried memories of her own. Crime drama, starring Brenda Blethyn, with Steven Hartley and Julie Graham

programme.desc: Hathaway and Lewis investigate a murder committed on the first night of a quiz weekend held at Chaucer College. Sealing the college grounds to interrogate the remaining 11 contestants, the pair discover the victim had a track record for sexual harassment involving fellow competitors, as well as past dealings with a shady engineering business funded by Russian gangsters and masterminded by Oxford professor Charles Milner - another quiz fan. With guest stars Alan Davies (QI), Timothy West (Bleak House) and Nicholas Farrell (The Iron Lady)

Crime thriller based on Joe R Lansdales novel, starring Michael C Hall, Sam Shepard and Don Johnson

programme.sub-title: Escape to the Chateau at Christmas
programme.desc: Dick, Angel, Arthur and Dorothy enjoy a magical festive adventure in this Christmas episode, with a family celebration inspired by a very special part of France - Colmar in the Alsace region, close to the German border. They discover an enchanting medieval town that makes Christmas feel more magical than ever. Its not long before they are taking part in a festive treasure hunt, sampling local baked delicacies, trying their hand at fondue, and discovering the ice and cremant wines that the region is synonymous with. Back at the chateau, the Strawbridge traditions are not forgotten. Angel, her mum Jenni and Dorothy head out into the chateau grounds to collect the fir and foliage to make the annual Christmas wreath

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: At Château du Puits Es Pratx, Tim and Sasha set about turning a wine barrel into a bespoke wine store. However, it fails to prove quite as simple to achieve as they had imagined. In the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, new chateau family the Hutsons have a diamond wedding they need to be ready for. Meanwhile in the Charente-Maritime, Bart and Sarah have a huge damp problem they need to resolve. Narrated by Adjoa Andoh

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Estate agent Mike is in charge, and plans to win over his guests by hosting a relaxed evening with no theme and no fancy dress. But how will he cope when Chloe turns up with a surprise guest in tow?

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The latest competition kicks off in Deighton, North Yorkshire, at The White Swan, run by couple Roman Solnar and Tamsyn Muller, who hope that their guests will appreciate their no-nonsense approach. The BandB provides everything that Nick and David need, but doesnt meet Farid and Johns high standards. At breakfast, there are grumbles over the order of service, which leaves some of the guests wondering just how picky people can be

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to Clough View Farm in Matlock, Derbyshire, where hosts Lisa Hardy and Sally Dakin hope that their generosity of spirit will be a hit with their guests. Nick and David count the costs and serve up some suspicions at dinner. A long wait for breakfast leaves the guests grumbling, and Tamsyn and Roman find their feedback hard to stomach

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week is to The Buxted Inn in Uckfield, East Sussex, run by Nick Bolton and chef David Kirby, and where the focus is on food and wine. Lisa is charmed by the character of the place, but Farid and John think it has a corporate feel. At breakfast, a menu misunderstanding leaves Farid with more than he bargained for

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final stay is at the Crescent Victoria hotel in Margate, Kent, where hosts Farid Al-Faisal and John Dennis aim to treat their guests like royalty. Unfortunately, only one of the pairs feel like princesses, with the rest being less than impressed by the attempt at luxury

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final day of the competition sees the BandB owners meet for the last time to find out what theyve been paid and to settle some scores. The White Swan is first and Roman and Tamsyn have some cracks to paper over from previous critiques in the week

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Bolton-based bricklayer Paul Rimmer, who has spent his career restoring and renovating Victorian terrace houses, sets his sights on constructing a state-of-the-art home on a budget of £350,000. However, instead of using the construction materials he has spent the past 40 years mastering, he has opted to build his new home from wood. Roping in his wife Carol, daughter Abby and a selection of favoured workmates, Paul and his team begin work on the ultra-modern, five-bedroom build, and Kevin McCloud reveals how extreme weather, exhaustion, and rapidly dwindling funds place the entire project in jeopardy

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Fifty-three-year-old motorbike enthusiast Scott is rushed in after crashing at high-speed at a track event, and there are concerns he may have suffered spinal injury. Meanwhile, 74-year-old Peter has potentially life-threatening injuries after being crushed under an eight-ton static caravan and 21-year-old hockey player Lizzie has severely broken her ankle during training and needs a reset

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Staff at Queens Medical Centre in Nottingham treat Kaeden, a 16-year-old battling a serious childhood illness, who has been rushed in after developing a fever at home. His mother describes her sons struggle with acute lymphoblastic leukaemia. Other patients include an aspiring pilot who has come off his motorbike during a track race and a man who has partially amputated his thumb

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: Paramedics are called out to a van and a car that have collided at a roundabout, involving a man who must always wear a crash helmet to protect himself from frequent seizures. A woman at a social club fears chest pains could be a sign of a heart attack. And a trip to the shops ends badly after a nasty fall

Kate Quilton sets Matt Tebbutt the challenge of making crumpets, and finds out how they get filled with unique holes at the Warburtons factory in Enfield, north London. programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the towns annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A boy begins to doubt whether Father Christmas really exists as he waits for the sound of sleigh bells on Christmas Eve. But he and hundreds of other lucky children receive a shock when a magical steam engine arrives in the night to take them to the North Pole and meet the man himself. Robert Zemeckis animated adventure, based on Chris Van Allsburgs book, features the voices of Tom Hanks, Leslie Zemeckis and Eddie Deezen

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: A hard-working, small-town businessman comes to think his life has been a complete waste of time and tries to commit suicide. At the last minute, his guardian angel pays him a visit and makes him realise his true worth by showing him what would have happened to those around him had he never been born. Fantasy drama, starring James Stewart, Donna Reed, Lionel Barrymore, Henry Travers, Beulah Bondi, Thomas Mitchell and Frank Faylen

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: A child is taken in by kind-hearted Santa and raised as an elf - so it comes as a shock when he discovers years later that he is in fact human. Deciding to get back to his roots, he heads off for New York in search of his long-lost family, but is ill-prepared for the hustle and bustle of the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, starring Will Ferrell, James Caan, Zooey Deschanel and Edward Asner

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: An American householder is dismayed when his plans for a traditional festive family holiday are thrown into complete disarray by a succession of annoying neighbours and long-lost relatives, who turn up on his doorstep offering their own brand of Christmas cheer. Comedy, starring Chevy Chase, Beverly DAngelo, Randy Quaid, Diane Ladd, Juliette Lewis, Miriam Flynn, Johnny Galecki and William Hickey

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having settled their differences, Brad and Dustys newfound friendship is put to the test when their respective fathers - one gentle, the other overly macho - arrive for the Christmas holidays, forcing them to change their plans. What starts as a break at a fun-filled trip to a luxury resort turns into something far more chaotic. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson and John Lithgow

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: A heartless TV executive is cruel to his employees and sees the festive season as nothing more than an opportunity to make money. However, on Christmas Eve, three ghosts arrive in the night and challenge him to change his cynical ways by showing him his past, present and future. Comedy based on Charles Dickens A Christmas Carol, starring Bill Murray, Karen Allen, John Forsythe, David Johansen and Carol Kane

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A teenager is given a strange, cute creature as a Christmas present by his eccentric father and warned to keep it away from water, not to feed it after midnight, or expose it to direct light. However, a chance dousing causes the furball to spawn a horde of murderous little monsters, and their devilish antics bring mayhem to a small town. Comedy horror, with Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, Hoyt Axton and Polly Holliday

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When a CEO threatens drastic action to improve the financial performance of the Chicago branch of her company, the affected manager - who is also her brother - throws an epic festive party to impress a client and close a potential sale which would save jobs. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman and Jennifer Aniston

programme.title: 12 Days of Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Successful businessman Brian Conway gets into a car accident on December 24, which turns into a life-changing event. Santa gives him 12 chances to re-do the day, and repair his relationships to find the true meaning of Christmas. Director Dustin Rikerts Groundhog Day-style comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, Spencer Grammer, Mitch Poulos and Uschi Umscheid

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: A retired mechanic who lost his wife a year earlier invites his daughters and sons to his house for a traditional celebration. However, its not long before they start arguing, seemingly scuppering his chances of a happy Christmas. Comedy, starring Danny Glover, Romany Malco and MoNique

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: The cheery sea creature tries to prevent a precious secret formula from falling into the wrong hands - but when it goes missing, the end of the world approaches. SpongeBob and his friends embark on a quest to get it back, which leads to them developing superpowers and venturing onto dry land. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny and Antonio Banderas

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: The hapless fool is employed as a security guard for a British art gallery and is sent to Los Angeles to bring back a famous painting. Unfortunately, he finds himself mistaken for a renowned art professor and invited to make an important presentation. Mel Smiths British comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Burt Reynolds, Peter MacNicol, John Mills, Peter Capaldi and June Brown

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: A mischievous rabbit has the run of a farm and its vegetable patch when the owner unexpectedly dies. When a relative inherits the property, he strives to rid his land of the rabbit and his woodland friends - but his feelings for a nature-loving woman complicate the battle of wits with the animal kingdom. Family comedy based on Beatrix Potters stories, starring Domhnall Gleeson and Rose Byrne, with the voices of James Corden and Margot Robbie

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: In 1927, the Magical Congress of the United States of America transfers the dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald to Europe to stand trial, but he escapes. In an attempt to scupper the evil sorcerers plans of raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings, Albus Dumbledore enlists his former student Newt Scamander to help. Second part of JK Rowlings Harry Potter prequel saga, starring Eddie Redmayne, Johnny Depp, Katherine Waterston and Jude Law

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Orphan Lyra Belacqua lives in a parallel universe populated by magical and menacing characters. When her best friend becomes the latest in a long line of children to mysteriously vanish, she embarks on a perilous mission to uncover the dark secret behind their disappearance. Fantasy adventure based on Philip Pullmans novel Northern Lights, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Nicole Kidman, Daniel Craig and Eva Green. Featuring the voices of Ian McKellen, Kristin Scott Thomas and Kathy Bates

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young shop assistant in Victorian England enters a magical parallel world in search of a fallen star to give to the girl of his dreams. However, the star in question is in fact a beautiful woman, who he helps flee from a wicked witch and a murderous prince. Fantasy adventure, based on Neil Gaimans novel, with Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Mark Strong and Sienna Miller. Narrated by Ian McKellen

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two squabbling brothers with time on their hands decide to play a mysterious old board game after finding it in their basement. A chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Kristen Stewart, Tim Robbins and Dax Shepard.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: Musical based on The Wizard of Oz, featuring an all-black cast. Dorothy is suddenly whisked off to a magical land and makes some unusual friends as she tries to get back home, while avoiding the malevolent attentions of a wicked witch. Directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Diana Ross, Michael Jackson and Richard Pryor

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: The Cinema List
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Festive Fun
Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Scientist Trevor Anderson sets out to locate his missing explorer brother after receiving a book charting his last journey. Accompanied by his nephew and an Icelandic guide, he is led to a mountain peak, where he stumbles across a system of caves leading to a lost underground world. Fantasy adventure, starring Brendan Fraser, Josh Hutcherson and Anita Briem

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Orphan Lyra Belacqua lives in a parallel universe populated by magical and menacing characters. When her best friend becomes the latest in a long line of children to mysteriously vanish, she embarks on a perilous mission to uncover the dark secret behind their disappearance. Fantasy adventure based on Philip Pullmans novel Northern Lights, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Nicole Kidman, Daniel Craig and Eva Green. Featuring the voices of Ian McKellen, Kristin Scott Thomas and Kathy Bates

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young shop assistant in Victorian England enters a magical parallel world in search of a fallen star to give to the girl of his dreams. However, the star in question is in fact a beautiful woman, who he helps flee from a wicked witch and a murderous prince. Fantasy adventure, based on Neil Gaimans novel, with Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Mark Strong and Sienna Miller. Narrated by Ian McKellen

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Scientist Trevor Anderson sets out to locate his missing explorer brother after receiving a book charting his last journey. Accompanied by his nephew and an Icelandic guide, he is led to a mountain peak, where he stumbles across a system of caves leading to a lost underground world. Fantasy adventure, starring Brendan Fraser, Josh Hutcherson and Anita Briem

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Fact-based period drama based on the life of Peter Pan author JM Barrie. As a young-at-heart playwright, Barrie is uncomfortable with life in the critical spotlight. However, his friendship with four boys and their free-spirited widowed mother brings him the inspiration for his greatest work. Starring Johnny Depp, Kate Winslet, Dustin Hoffman, Julie Christie, Freddie Highmore and Kelly Macdonald

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: The bumbling fool wins first prize in the church raffle - a trip to France and a video camera. His travels cause chaos as he disrupts a film shoot in Cannes, to the fury of its megalomaniac director, and is then accused of kidnapping a youngster. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Willem Dafoe, Emma de Caunes and Max Baldry

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Two bored youngsters are led on a series of zany misadventures when a manic moggy comes knocking at their door with a magical stovepipe hat on his head and mischief in mind. Comedy fantasy based on the childrens book by Dr Seuss, starring Mike Myers, Alec Baldwin, Dakota Fanning and Spencer Breslin

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: A megalomaniac threatens to take over the world, so two married spies come out of retirement to thwart his plans. However, when they go missing, it is up to their plucky children to step in and save the day. Family adventure directed by Robert Rodriguez, starring Antonio Banderas, Carla Gugino, Alan Cumming, Alexa Vega and Daryl Sabara

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: A widowed mothers first date in years takes a chilling turn when shes bombarded with anonymous threatening phone messages during their dinner, leaving her questioning if her charming suitor is behind the harassment. Director Christopher Landons thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mothers decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the towns annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: A year after their friend disappeared, a group find themselves trapped in a time loop, where they are hunted and killed unless they survive until dawn. Video game-inspired horror, starring Ella Rubin, Michael Cimino and Odessa Azion

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever

Director Christopher Landons thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: A year after their friend disappeared, a group find themselves trapped in a time loop, where they are hunted and killed unless they survive until dawn. Video game-inspired horror, starring Ella Rubin, Michael Cimino and Odessa Azion

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: An Afghanistan veteran comes head to head with her Vietnam vet grandfather at the familys lake house. Comedy drama, starring Sonequa Martin-Green (The Walking Dead), Natalie Morales and Ed Harris

programme.title: A Newport Christmas
programme.desc: A charitable and spirited Newport socialite in 1905 dreams of using her cash to start a foundation to help others in town. Romantic drama, starring Wes Brown and Ginna Claire Mason

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Festive Fun
Tinsel Town
programme.desc: Washed-up Hollywood action hero Bradley Mack takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor. Festive family comedy, starring Kiefer Sutherland, Rebel Wilson, Alice Eve and Danny Dyer

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the towns annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: Washed-up Hollywood action hero Bradley Mack takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor. Festive family comedy, starring Kiefer Sutherland, Rebel Wilson, Alice Eve and Danny Dyer

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A writer travels to the remote compound of pop star Alfred Moretti, where she discovers the twisted plans of his cult. Writer/director Mark Anthony Greens thriller, starring Ayo Edebiri, John Malkovich and Juliette Lewis

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: Washed-up Hollywood action hero Bradley Mack takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor. Festive family comedy, starring Kiefer Sutherland, Rebel Wilson, Alice Eve and Danny Dyer

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planets surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: Washed-up Hollywood action hero Bradley Mack takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor. Festive family comedy, starring Kiefer Sutherland, Rebel Wilson, Alice Eve and Danny Dyer

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinskis remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: The Ring 2
programme.desc: Journalist Rachel Keller and her son try to rebuild their shattered lives, moving from Seattle to Oregon and starting afresh. However, the vengeful spirit of Samara follows, and this time she is determined to destroy them. Sequel to the horror remake, starring Naomi Watts, Simon Baker and David Dorfman, and featuring a cameo appearance from Sissy Spacek

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As his behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman

programme.title: Constantine
programme.desc: Exorcist John Constantine is cursed with the ability to see spirits stalking the Earth, and grudgingly takes on the forces of evil, hoping his actions will earn him a place in heaven. However, he is told he has terminal cancer and time for salvation is running out - unless a policewoman investigating her twin sisters death can find the key to saving his soul. Supernatural thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Rachel Weisz and Tilda Swinton

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: A streetwise cop is enlisted by a top-secret government force dedicated to policing alien visitors to Earth, teaming up with a veteran agent just as a body-swapping extraterrestrial giant insect begins a reign of terror throughout New York City. Sci-fi comedy, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Linda Fiorentino, Rip Torn and Vincent DOnofrio

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Agent J investigates the unauthorised landing of a spacecraft and discovers a malevolent alien disguised as a lingerie model is on the verge of destroying humanity. His only hope of stopping her diabolical plot is to restore the memory of his retired partner K - but his former mentor takes more than a little convincing. Sci-fi comedy sequel, directed by Barry Sonnenfeld, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Rosario Dawson, Lara Flynn Boyle, Johnny Knoxville, Rip Torn and Tony Shalhoub

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: An alien criminal escapes from a prison on the moon and goes back in time on a mission of revenge, changing the course of history. Agent J of the top-secret Earth defence organisation follows him back to 1969, and joins forces with a younger version of his mentor Agent K to set things right. Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Will Smith, Josh Brolin and Tommy Lee Jones

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: A half-vampire possesses all the strengths inherent in bloodsuckers with none of their weaknesses, and is determined to wipe the monsters from the face of the Earth. However, he faces a deadly new threat in a renegade vampire who is close to decoding an ancient prophecy that will allow him to repopulate the world with his kind. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Stephen Dorff and Kris Kristofferson

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriends father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard

programme.title: The Last Stop In Yuma County
programme.desc: While stuck at a rural Arizona rest stop, a salesman is thrust into a hostage situation by the arrival of two ruthless bank robbers. Writer/director Francis Galluppis crime thriller, starring Jim Cummings, Faizon Love and Jocelin Donahue

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer is all set to leave the criminal world behind and start a new life abroad. However, his plans are thwarted when he is asked to track down a gangsters drug-addicted daughter and locate a stolen shipment of Ecstasy. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Michael Gambon, Colm Meaney, Kenneth Cranham and Sienna Miller

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: A group of conspirators contracts the Jackal, a professional hitman, to assassinate President Charles de Gaulle of France. The killer starts to put his painstaking plans into action, creating a new identity, establishing his alibi and commissioning a custom-made weapon, while out-foxing the French police at every turn. Fred Zinnemanns adaptation of Fredericks Forsyth thriller, with Edward Fox, Michael Lonsdale, Alan Badel, Tony Britton and Cyril Cusack

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: The seaside resort of Amity is terrorised once again by a man-eating great white shark. While police chief Brody struggles to alert the townsfolk to the magnitude of the danger, a group of teenagers - including Brodys two sons - is adrift at sea in waters hunted by the shark. Director Jeannot Szwarcs thriller sequel, starring Roy Scheider, Lorraine Gary and Murray Hamilton, with John Williams once more providing the acclaimed score

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: A shark is captured by divers and put on display in a Florida marine centre, where it ultimately dies. However, examination of the body reveals the seemingly fully-grown shark was actually a baby - and its enormous, ferocious mother soon comes looking for it. Thriller sequel, originally released in cinemas in 3D, starring Dennis Quaid, Simon MacCorkindale, Louis Gossett Jr and Bess Armstrong

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Convict Rudy learns his cellmate has a girlfriend on the outside who he has only ever communicated with by letter. When the romantic inmate is killed in a riot and Rudy is paroled, he decides to track this woman down and assume the dead mans identity. However, his deception draws him into a casino robbery being orchestrated by her crazed brother. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron and Gary Sinise

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle

programme.title: Oceans Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia, Don Cheadle and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Four teenagers are sentenced to reform school after a prank results in the accidental death of an old man, and suffer sexual abuse at the hands of the guards. Years later, when the boys have grown up and begun to follow very different professions, a chance encounter with one of their abusers inspires them to plot revenge. Drama, starring Brad Pitt, Robert De Niro, Dustin Hoffman, Kevin Bacon, Jason Patric and Minnie Driver

programme.title: Escape from Alcatraz
programme.desc: A cunning convict with a history of making escape attempts is transferred to the notorious high-security island prison off the California coast, from which no one has ever broken out. Continually at odds with the brutal warden, he and three fellow prisoners hatch a plan to make it to freedom on an improvised raft. Thriller, based on a true story, starring Clint Eastwood, Patrick McGoohan, Roberts Blossom and Fred Ward

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Fugitive serial killer Dr Hannibal Lecter has gone into hiding as an academic in Italy, but a disfigured victim is determined to find him and inflict a gruesome revenge. FBI agent Clarice Starling is once again drawn into the doctors deadly orbit as she finds herself being used as bait for the avengers trap. Ridley Scotts thriller sequel, starring Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman and Ray Liotta

programme.title: Maggie Moore(s)
programme.desc: Police Chief Sanders investigates the bizarre murders of two women with the same name and unravels a web of small-town lies. He soon falls for Rita, a nosy neighbour who is eager to help solve the mystery. Director John Slatterys comedy thriller, starring Jon Hamm, Nick Mohammed and Tina Fey

programme.title: The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his familys Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Francis Ford Coppolas 2020 directors cut of The Godfather: Part III, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach and Bridget Fonda

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: A shark is captured by divers and put on display in a Florida marine centre, where it ultimately dies. However, examination of the body reveals the seemingly fully-grown shark was actually a baby - and its enormous, ferocious mother soon comes looking for it. Thriller sequel, originally released in cinemas in 3D, starring Dennis Quaid, Simon MacCorkindale, Louis Gossett Jr and Bess Armstrong

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patients fractured mind as a 24th character with apparent superhuman abilities attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalans thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley

programme.title: Oceans Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. programme.desc: The series examines six more mysterious satellite images, including a possible smokescreen over North Korea, and two forgotten pyramids in Egypt

programme.title: History of Weapons
programme.desc: A team of experts tests the deadliest weapons upgrades across the history of warfare, including the Scorpio, the long sword and Henrys rifle

programme.title: History of Weapons
programme.desc: Experts take a look at three weapons that have been used to attack civilian populations, including the brutal trebuchet catapult and, possibly the most terrifying of all, the atomic bomb

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Experts investigate an Italian mountain that has stood witness to inexplicable phenomena for centuries, wondering whether it could somehow be attracting alien visitors

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Investigations into the possibility that extraterrestrials with a superior knowledge of science and engineering landed on Earth thousands of years ago

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: The Hudson Valley area of upstate New York, where more than 7,000 UFO sightings have been reported. This edition speculates whether the area is home to one of the many extra-terrestrial gateways that are believed to be spread all over the world

programme.title: Digging Up Britains Past
programme.sub-title: Invincible - The Royal Navys Greatest Ship
programme.desc: Raksha Dave and Alex Langlands examine the history of HMS Invincible, which was captured from the French in 1747 and helped transform the Royal Navy with the lessons it taught about organisation and ship design. For more than 260 years, HMS Invincible lay at the bottom of the Solent, but archaeologists are now diving beneath the waves in a £2m excavation to discover more about this game-changing ship

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: In North Yorkshire, Beau Ouimette, Rick Edwards and Gary Bankhead search both the River Nidd and River Swale for lost weaponry from the brutal battles in 1318 and 1319 between the English and the Scottish. Among a number of finds, the trio uncover a lead token dating back to the 1300s and the time of the Scottish raiders

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: The presenter explores the strange world of crime, featuring stories that both amuse and bewilder. One of the highlights is the infamous case of a robber who managed to snatch the brain of Albert Einstein. This peculiar theft raised questions about the motivations behind such an audacious act. Aykroyd sheds light on the details surrounding this unusual crime and its impact on history. Other examples include a thief who dressed as Santa Claus while making off with hundreds of dollars
